Title: Mediawiki tools for Office
Description: The current version installs an Outlook 2007 plugin. This plugin adds a send to wiki command to the outlook context menu. The functionality is very similar to the behavior of the One Note plugin which is installed in office 2007.
HomeWiki:
Overview

The current version installs an Outlook 2007 and Word 2007 add-in. This plugin adds a "send to wiki" command to the outlook context menu. The functionality is very similar to the behavior of the One Note plugin which is installed in office 2007. In addition, the submission functionality is pluggable, allowing submissions to other types of web REST compatible applications such as ASP.Net MVC. It is also possible to develop new submission plug-ins and easily incorporate into the main outlook plugin.

The plugin also integrates with Microsoft Word. In word 2007, under add-ins, a submit button should be present which enables a user to submit the current document to the wiki server.

Current Functionality

Outlook Add In

  • Can Export Email in mediawiki or xml format and post item to mediawiki server
  • Exports all outlook objects with fully populated semantic properties (see http://www.semanticmediawiki.org)

Word Add In

  • Exports a word document to mediawiki server
